name: Hiearcool USB C Hub, USB-C Multi-Port Adapter for MacBook Pro, 7IN1 USBC to HDMI Hub Dongle Compatible for Laptops and Other Type C Devices (4K HDMI USB3.0 SD/TF Card Reader 100W PD)
description: Connect all your devices with this versatile USB-C hub. Features stunning 4K HDMI video output, robust 100W Power Delivery for charging, 2x high-speed USB 3.0 ports, and convenient SD/TF card readers for seamless data transfer..

name: Apple MFi Certified 2 Pack Lightning to 3.5 mm Headphone Jack Adapter for iPhone, iPhone Aux Adapter Converter Dongle Audio Cable Compatible with iPhone 14 13 12 11 X XS 8 7
description: MFi-certified Lightning to 3.5mm adapter for iPhone, delivering 48kHz/26-bit audio

name: iPhone Charger Fast Charging,[Apple MFi Certified] 2Pack 20W Type C Fast Charger Block with 6FT USB C to Lightning Cable Compatible for iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max/Xs Max/XR/X,iPad
description: Get rapid charging for your iPhone with this 3-pack of 20W PD 3.0 USB-C chargers, each paired with a 6ft MFi-certified USB-C to Lightning cable. Charges compatible iPhones up to 60% in just 30 minutes, significantly faster than standard chargers. Features universal compatibility for a wide range of Apple devices and built-in safety protections.

name: Anker USB C Hub, 5-in-1 USBC to HDMI Splitter with 4K Display, 1 x Powered USB-C 5Gbps & 2x Powered USB-A 3.0 5Gbps Data Ports for MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, Dell and More
description: Expand your laptop's connections with this Anker 5-in-1 USB-C Hub. Easily connect to a 4K TV or monitor with HDMI, add USB devices like flash drives or keyboards, and even charge your laptop while using the hub. Perfect for everyday use with MacBooks, Dell, HP, and more.

name: Syntech USB C to USB Adapter Pack of 2 USB C Male to USB 3.0 Female Adapter Compatible with MacBook Pro Air 2024, Microsoft Surface, iPad,Samsung Notebook, Dell XPS and More Type C Devices,Space Grey
description: Convert your USB-C port to a standard USB 3.0 port with this 2-pack of Syntech adapters. Connect your existing USB accessories to modern USB-C laptops, tablets, and phones, enjoying fast data transfer and charging. Features durable zinc alloy design and plug-and-play simplicity.

name: Anker 575 USB-C Docking Station (13-in-1)
description: Equipped with an 85W laptop-charging USB-C port, an 18W Power Delivery USB-C port, a USB-C data port, 3 USB-A ports, 2 HDMI ports, a DisplayPort, an Ethernet port, SD/microSD card slots, a 3.5 mm AUX port, and a DC input. Simultaneously stream media to up to 3 monitors in 1080p@60Hz via the DisplayPort and dual HDMI ports. The dock provides simultaneous high-speed charging for your laptop and mobile devices. Note that macOS and iPadOS only support Single-Stream Transport (SST) mode.

name: KOORUI 24 Inch 100Hz Business Computer Monitor
description: Experience true-to-life colors and vivid details on this 24-inch monitor with a 99% sRGB color gamut and 10-bit gray level. The 1920x1080 full HD resolution, 16:9 aspect ratio, and 3000:1 contrast ratio provide stunning image clarity. It features an ultra-slim, three-sided frameless design, a 178° wide viewing angle, and includes eye comfort technologies like flicker-free and a blue light filter. With a 100Hz refresh rate (via HDMI) and FreeSync compatibility, it offers a smooth, tear-free experience for both gaming and video playback. It supports versatile mounting with VESA 100x100mm and has multiple connectivity options including HDMI, VGA, and an Audio Output.

name: BENFEI DisplayPort to HDMI Adapter
description: This compact and lightweight DisplayPort to HDMI adapter connects a computer or laptop with a DisplayPort output to a monitor, projector, or TV with an HDMI input. It's designed for superior stability with a built-in advanced IC chip that converts the signal in one direction only (DisplayPort to HDMI). The adapter supports resolutions up to 4K (3840x2160) at 30Hz and 1080p (1920x1080) at 60Hz. It features a gold-plated DisplayPort connector with latches for a secure connection and improved signal transmission performance.

name: UGREEN USB-C to 2.5G Ethernet Adapter
description: Upgrade your network to 2.5Gbps with this USB-C to Ethernet adapter. Equipped with a Realtek RTL8156BG chip for stable, low-power performance, it enables blazing-fast downloads, fluent streaming, and immersive gaming. This durable, aluminum-cased adapter is an easy way to give your devices a high-speed network connection, and it is also backward compatible with 10/100/1000Mbps speeds. The adapter is widely compatible with a variety of laptops, desktops, and mobile devices, but is not compatible with certain devices like Nintendo Switch, TVs, or some Synology NAS models.

name: LERTOSEN USB-C to 3.5mm Headphone Adapter (2-Pack)
description: Equipped with an advanced DAC smart chip, this USB-C to aux adapter provides high-definition, noise-free audio with a 48kHz sample rate. The adapter features a 92dBFS signal-to-noise ratio and Clear Voice Reduction (CVR) technology for crystal-clear calls. Its compact, plug-and-play design is reinforced with a nylon braided cable and aluminum alloy shell for durability. This 2-pack is universally compatible with most USB-C devices without a headphone jack, including iPhone 15 series, Samsung Galaxy S series, Google Pixel, and MacBooks, while also noting specific limitations for Apple EarPods.

name: RCA to HDMI Converter Adapter
description: This converter transforms analog RCA composite (yellow, white, red) signals into a digital HDMI output. It supports resolutions of 720P or 1080P at 60Hz and is a one-way adapter (RCA input to HDMI output only). The device is plug-and-play and requires a 5V USB power source to function. It uses a high-quality chip for advanced signal processing, providing a stable and clear output. The converter is widely compatible with various legacy devices, including older gaming consoles, VCRs, and DVD players.

name: GANA Bidirectional 4K HDMI Switcher
description: This bidirectional HDMI switcher offers three ports, allowing you to connect two HDMI sources to one display, or one HDMI source to two displays (only one display can be active at a time). It supports 4K resolution at 60Hz and is backward compatible with 2K and 1080p. The aluminum switch ensures fast and stable data transmission up to 3.4Gbps. It is a plug-and-play device that requires no external power and features two LED indicators to show which port is active. The switch is broadly compatible with most devices with standard HDMI ports.

name: A97 Bluetooth 5.4 Wireless Earbuds
description: These A97 wireless earbuds feature the latest Bluetooth 5.4 technology for a seamless, stable connection and reduced latency. They deliver Hi-Fi deep bass stereo sound with a 13mm vibrating diaphragm and AAC/SBC audio coding. The earbuds also include ENC (Environmental Noise Cancelling) for clear phone calls. With a dual LED display for battery status, they offer up to 8 hours of playback and a total of 40 hours with the charging case. They are IP7 waterproof and have an ergonomic design with high-sensitivity touch controls for universal compatibility with devices running Bluetooth 4.0 and above.

name: Asiahorse 16AWG Sleeved PSU Cable Extension Kit
description: This premium PSU cable extension kit enhances the aesthetics and performance of your PC build. It features UL1015 16AWG wire for superior power delivery and gold-plated terminals for enhanced durability, withstanding over 15,000 bends. The kit is an extension and does not plug directly into the power supply unit. It includes a 24-pin ATX cable, two 4+4-pin EPS cables for dual CPU motherboards, and three 8-pin (6+2 pin) PCI-E cables for a wide range of GPUs. Each cable comes with four combs for neat cable management. Multiple color options are available to match your PC's theme.

name: 4-Pin PWM Fan Splitter Cable (3-Pack)
description: This 4-pin PWM fan splitter cable allows you to connect up to three computer case fans to a single motherboard fan header. It's designed to increase airflow and reduce heat accumulation within a computer chassis. The cable is 26cm long for flexible fan placement and cleaner cable management. It is compatible with both 4-pin PWM and 3-pin fan connectors, with one 4-pin connector and two 3-pin connectors on each cable. This cost-effective 3-pack provides a convenient way to add more fans for improved cooling.

name: SABRENT USB 3.0 to SATA Adapter
description: This Sabrent adapter cable allows you to connect any 2.5" SATA I/II/III hard drive (HDD) or solid-state drive (SSD) to your computer via a USB 3.0 port. It supports data transfer speeds of up to 5Gbps, with UASP (USB Attached SCSI Protocol) for enhanced performance, especially with SSDs. The device is hot-swappable, plug-and-play, and requires no additional drivers. It features an LED light to indicate power and activity status and is also backward compatible with USB 2.0.

name: ACASIS M.2 NVMe & SATA to USB-C Docking Station
description: This toaster-style docking station provides a convenient, tool-free way to connect both M.2 NVMe and SATA SSDs to your computer. It features a USB 3.2 Type-C connection for super-speed data transfers up to 10Gbps. The high-quality aluminum construction and open horizontal design ensure superior heat dissipation, keeping your drives cool during intensive use. It is compatible with M.2 NVMe and SATA SSDs of various sizes (2230, 2242, 2260, 2280) and supports capacities up to 8TB. The device is plug-and-play and works with a wide range of operating systems, including Windows, macOS, and Linux.

name: Sabrent M.2 NVMe SSD to PCIe Adapter Card with Heatsink
description: This Sabrent adapter card allows you to install an M.2 NVMe SSD into an available PCIe x4, x8, or x16 slot on your desktop computer, providing a high-speed storage upgrade. The card features an aluminum heatsink and thermal pad for optimal heat dissipation to prevent thermal throttling and ensure stable performance. It is compatible with M.2 NVMe SSDs in sizes 2230, 2242, 2260, and 2280, and is a simple, tool-free installation with included hardware. The adapter is not compatible with SATA M.2 SSDs or PCIe x1 slots.
compatibility_tags: Not compatible with M.2 SATA SSDs
Not compatible with PCIe x1 slot

name: SONOFF ZBDongle-E Plus Zigbee 3.0 USB Dongle
description: The SONOFF ZBDongle-E is a Zigbee 3.0 USB dongle designed to be a Zigbee coordinator for smart home platforms. It comes pre-flashed with Zigbee coordinator firmware based on EZNet 6.10.3, enabling out-of-the-box use with systems like Home Assistant, openHAB, and Zigbee2MQTT. The dongle is based on the EFR32MG21 chip, features a +20dBm output gain for a strong signal, and has an aluminum housing to reduce signal interference from other devices.

name: eero 6 Extender (Add-on)
description: The eero 6 extender is an add-on unit designed to expand an existing eero mesh Wi-Fi 6 network by up to 1,500 sq. ft. It uses eero's patented TrueMesh technology to intelligently route network traffic, reducing dead spots and buffering for a reliable Wi-Fi experience. The device supports speeds up to 500 Mbps and is easy to set up in minutes using the eero app. It receives automatic security updates and is cross-compatible with other eero devices, allowing you to easily grow your network. This extender requires an existing eero router to function and does not have Ethernet ports.

name: Echo Show 8 (3rd Gen, 2023 release)
description: The Echo Show 8 is an 8-inch HD smart display with Alexa and a built-in smart home hub. It features room-filling spatial audio and a 13 MP centered, auto-framing camera for crisp video calls. The device simplifies smart home management by supporting Zigbee, Matter, and Thread devices without the need for a separate hub. Its adaptive content feature adjusts the display based on your proximity, and the device also serves as a digital photo frame with Amazon Photos. It is made from recycled materials and includes multiple layers of privacy controls.

name: AmazonBasics 15W Qi-Certified Wireless Charging Pad
description: This Qi-certified wireless charging pad delivers fast and efficient charging with an optimized chipset. It provides up to 15W for compatible LG phones, 10W for Samsung phones, and 7.5W for iPhones. The pad features a 'sleep-friendly' LED indicator that quietly signals the charging status. Its case-friendly design can charge through rubber, plastic, or TPU cases up to 5mm thick. The charger incorporates safety technology to protect against over-temperature, over-voltage, and over-current. Note that an AC adapter is not included and a high-wattage adapter is required to achieve the fastest charging speeds.

name: AmazonBasics 128GB microSDXC Memory Card
description: This AmazonBasics microSDXC memory card provides high-quality, ultra-fast storage for a wide range of devices. With read speeds up to 100MB/s and write speeds up to 60MB/s, it is ideal for capturing and storing high-resolution photos and Full HD/4K videos. The card is rated UHS-I U3, Class 10, and A2 for optimal performance with mobile apps. It comes with a full-size SD adapter for broader compatibility and is built for lasting reliability with shockproof, waterproof, temperature-proof, X-ray-proof, and magnetic-proof features. Note that the actual speeds may vary by device, and it is crucial to check device compatibility for microSDXC cards and their maximum supported capacity.

name: TESSAN 7-in-1 European Travel Plug Adapter
description: This TESSAN 7-in-1 adapter is a Type C plug designed for use in most European countries. It converts a single EU outlet into 4 standard AC outlets, 2 USB-A ports (2.4A max each), and 1 USB-C port (3A max), allowing you to charge up to 7 devices simultaneously. The compact and lightweight design is ideal for travel. It is important to note that this is a plug adapter only and not a voltage converter. All connected devices must be dual-voltage compatible (100V-250V). The adapter is also certified for cruise ship use due to its lack of surge protection.

name: QINLIANF 9-in-1 USB Wall Charger Surge Protector
description: This multi-function wall charger and surge protector is designed to expand a single duplex outlet into 5 AC outlets and 4 USB ports (3 USB-A, 1 USB-C). It secures to the wall with a screw for stability. The 5 AC outlets are spaced with 2.1 inches between them, accommodating larger plugs. The 4 USB ports provide a total of 4.8A, with the USB-A ports at 5V/2.4A max and the USB-C port at 5V/3A max. The device features a 3-level complementary surge protection circuit (TVS, MOV, GDT) with a minimum 1680J energy absorbing capacity for quick and reliable protection. It is ETL Certified for safety, but it is not a Quick Charger 3.0 device and is only compatible with duplex outlets.
